name: ManOWar (itch)
description:
MAN O WAR: LEGEND OF THE HEAVY JELLY

  • Use the mouse to aim and shoot.
  • Swim with right-click or any keyboard button.
  • Avoid walls and enemies.
  • Press ESC to pause.
  • PROTIP Use your shooting knockback to slow down.
  • Take on all 12 levels and then the final boss!

Thanks guys! Have fun.
